title: Dreadful Hollow
description: Terrified Jillian Dare learns what evil is at Dreadful Hollow - a horror that reaches out to her from the monstrous darkness! Danger pursues Jillian from the first moment she enters the strange mansion of the mysterious Countess Ana Czerner.But from direction does it come? From the aged, tyrannical Countess herself? From her jealous housekeeper? From the grotesque, half-witted gardener? From the strange, foreign physician? Or from the Countess' beautiful but cruel "niece"? Suddenly the danger becomes more than a threat. It bursts upon Jillian with fury. Amidst almost uncontrollable fear, Jillian turns to the young local doctor who has tried to befriend her. But is he her friend - or enemy?
author: Irina Karlova
